text:
The US  has:

👉4% of the world's population
👉25% of the world's cases of #SARSCoV2
👉20% of the world's deaths due to #COVID19 

As of today, 1 out of every 788 Americans has died of #coronavirus. 

Please #WearAMask, don't gather indoors, & get #COVID19 #vaccine when you can. https://t.co/iXjLMu06xU
